item.title: Police look to extend use of SA's new 'stop and search' knife laws
item.description: <p>It&#x27;s believed Adelaide Railway Station will be among the first locations where the new measures will be used, allowing officers to search passengers using metal detecting wands.</p>

item.title: FBI boss Kash Patel gave New Zealand officials 3D-printed guns illegal to possess under local laws
item.description: <p>On a visit to New Zealand, FBI Director Kash Patel gave the country&#x27;s police and spy bosses gifts of inoperable pistols that were illegal to possess under local gun laws and had to be destroyed.</p>
